## generated by : /project/noujdine_61/kdeweese/bin/cactus-bin-v2.6.7/cactus_env/bin/cactus-prepare s_lat_alignment.txt --jobStore cactus_prepare_steps_jobstore --outDir cactus-steps-output --outSeqFile cactus-steps-output/s_lat_alignment.txt --outHal cactus-steps-output/s_lat_alignment.hal --preprocessCores 14 --blastCores 14 --alignCores 14 --preprocessMemory 20G --blastMemory 65G --alignMemory 300G
## date : 2023-11-29 14:39:12.653040
## cactus commit : b7c7b2e6c50ad02e37aa2649440b12629b6447e0


## Preprocessor
cactus-preprocess cactus_prepare_steps_jobstore/0 s_lat_alignment.txt cactus-steps-output/s_lat_alignment.txt --inputNames Saccharina_japonica Saccharina_latissima Macrocystis_pyrifera Undaria_pinnatifida Ectocarpus_siliculosus  --maxCores 14 --maxMemory 18.6Gi --logFile cactus-steps-output/logs/preprocess-Saccharina_japonica.log

## Alignment

### Round 0
cactus-blast cactus_prepare_steps_jobstore/1 cactus-steps-output/s_lat_alignment.txt cactus-steps-output/Anc1.paf --root Anc1  --maxCores 14 --maxMemory 60.5Gi --logFile cactus-steps-output/logs/blast-Anc1.log
cactus-align cactus_prepare_steps_jobstore/2 cactus-steps-output/s_lat_alignment.txt cactus-steps-output/Anc1.paf cactus-steps-output/Anc1.hal --root Anc1  --maxCores 14 --maxMemory 279.4Gi --logFile cactus-steps-output/logs/align-Anc1.log
hal2fasta cactus-steps-output/Anc1.hal Anc1 --hdf5InMemory > cactus-steps-output/Anc1.fa

cactus-blast cactus_prepare_steps_jobstore/3 cactus-steps-output/s_lat_alignment.txt cactus-steps-output/Anc3.paf --root Anc3  --maxCores 14 --maxMemory 60.5Gi --logFile cactus-steps-output/logs/blast-Anc3.log
cactus-align cactus_prepare_steps_jobstore/4 cactus-steps-output/s_lat_alignment.txt cactus-steps-output/Anc3.paf cactus-steps-output/Anc3.hal --root Anc3  --maxCores 14 --maxMemory 279.4Gi --logFile cactus-steps-output/logs/align-Anc3.log
hal2fasta cactus-steps-output/Anc3.hal Anc3 --hdf5InMemory > cactus-steps-output/Anc3.fa

### Round 1
cactus-blast cactus_prepare_steps_jobstore/5 cactus-steps-output/s_lat_alignment.txt cactus-steps-output/Anc2.paf --root Anc2  --maxCores 14 --maxMemory 60.5Gi --logFile cactus-steps-output/logs/blast-Anc2.log
cactus-align cactus_prepare_steps_jobstore/6 cactus-steps-output/s_lat_alignment.txt cactus-steps-output/Anc2.paf cactus-steps-output/Anc2.hal --root Anc2  --maxCores 14 --maxMemory 279.4Gi --logFile cactus-steps-output/logs/align-Anc2.log
hal2fasta cactus-steps-output/Anc2.hal Anc2 --hdf5InMemory > cactus-steps-output/Anc2.fa

### Round 2
cactus-blast cactus_prepare_steps_jobstore/7 cactus-steps-output/s_lat_alignment.txt cactus-steps-output/Anc0.paf --root Anc0  --maxCores 14 --maxMemory 60.5Gi --logFile cactus-steps-output/logs/blast-Anc0.log
cactus-align cactus_prepare_steps_jobstore/8 cactus-steps-output/s_lat_alignment.txt cactus-steps-output/Anc0.paf cactus-steps-output/s_lat_alignment.hal --root Anc0  --maxCores 14 --maxMemory 279.4Gi --logFile cactus-steps-output/logs/align-Anc0.log
hal2fasta cactus-steps-output/s_lat_alignment.hal Anc0 --hdf5InMemory > cactus-steps-output/Anc0.fa

## HAL merging
halAppendSubtree cactus-steps-output/s_lat_alignment.hal cactus-steps-output/Anc2.hal Anc2 Anc2 --merge --hdf5InMemory
halAppendSubtree cactus-steps-output/s_lat_alignment.hal cactus-steps-output/Anc1.hal Anc1 Anc1 --merge --hdf5InMemory
halAppendSubtree cactus-steps-output/s_lat_alignment.hal cactus-steps-output/Anc3.hal Anc3 Anc3 --merge --hdf5InMemory
